ModMetaData.name: SkyMind Network
ModMetaData.author: Killathon
ModMetaData.description:
A Standalone version of the SkyMind Network originally implemented by ARandomKiwi for Android Tiers++. Requires only Harmony. Compatibility with other mods like Rimatomics, Rimefeller, MH: ATR, and more to come!
Version <color=#FFD800>1.0.1</color>.
